def is_at_tv(couch:item):
    # Determine whether the couch is facing the television
    symbol facing_tv=exists tv: item : is_television(tv) and facing(couch, tv)
    return facing_tv

def remote_control_close_to_hand(remote_control:item, couch:item):
    # Determine if the remote control is within reach from the couch
    symbol close_to_hand=close(remote_control, couch)
    return close_to_hand

behavior turn_on_tv(remote_control: item, tv: item):
    body:
        achieve facing(remote_control, tv)
        achieve is_on(tv)

behavior __goal__():
    body:
        bind couch: item where:
            is_couch(couch) and is_at_tv(couch)
        # Select the couch that is facing the TV
        
        bind remote_control: item where:
            is_remote_control(remote_control) and remote_control_close_to_hand(remote_control, couch
)
        # Select the remote control close to the couch
        
        bind tv: item where:
            is_television(tv)
        # Select the television
        
        turn_on_tv(remote_control, tv) 
        # Use the remote control to turn on the television
